mapper.select: SELECT o.ono, b.book_title, bi.image_name, od.order_total , od.order_count FROM orders o INNER JOIN order_details od ON o.ono = od.ono INNER JOIN member m on o.member_id=m.member_id INNER JOIN book b ON od.bno = b.bno INNER JOIN book_image bi ON b.bno = bi.bno GROUP BY o.ono, b.book_title, bi.image_name, od.order_count, od.order_total

SELECT o.ono, b.book_title, bi.image_name, od.order_total, b.book_price, o.point_earn, od.order_count , d.zip_code, d.receiver_name FROM orders o INNER JOIN order_details od ON o.ono = od.ono INNER JOIN member m on o.member_id=m.member_id INNER JOIN book b ON od.bno = b.bno INNER JOIN book_image bi ON b.bno = bi.bno INNER JOIN delivery d on o.dno= d.dno GROUP BY o.ono, b.book_title, bi.image_name, od.order_total, d.zip_code, d.receiver_name, od.order_count, b.book_price, o.point_earn
